extension.description:
Stream for FREE all the music love ! Experience an endless world of music. No fees, no ads: only music! Bored of not being allowed to enjoy Radiohead and Led Zeppelin on the same premium/ad-supported music service? Frustrated because you missed your favorite band playing a killer show nearby a few days ago? This is where BlitzrMusic comes in. Free, with no ads, BlitzrMusic is the ultimate portal to music, built by music addicts for music lovers. EXPERIENCE AN ENDLESS WORLD OF MUSIC, FROM MAINSTREAM STARS TO UNDERGROUND HEROES! NO FEES, NO ADS: ONLY MUSIC!
- Our agnostic metaplayer (Youtube, Bandcamp, Soundcloud) gives you access to a library of over 4 million artists / 40 million tracks. - Search and browse by artist, album, song, genre or label - Enjoy complete albums, organized into full artists discographies
ENJOY LIVE MUSIC and SUPPORT YOUR MUSIC SCENE!
- Keep in touch with the tour dates of your favorite artists and latest discoveries
